title: Data Center Boom Brings Risks of Overbuilding, Ares’ deVeer Says
description: The flood of capital pouring into AI infrastructure is raising the risks of overcapacity as the world’s biggest investors look to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom, according to Ares Management Corp. Co-President Kipp deVeer.
content:

title: CFA Level I Pass Rate Drops to 43% as AI Models Ace Final Exam
description: Thousands of people sat for the first of three tests in August to become chartered financial analysts, and less than half passed. At the same time, artificial-intelligence models — the systems many in finance are afraid will someday take their jobs — have now advanced to the point they can ace the final level of the CFA exam in minutes.
content: Thousands of people sat for the first of three tests in August to become chartered financial analysts, and less than half passed. At the same time, artificial-intelligence models — the systems many in finance are afraid will someday take their jobs —... [435 chars]

title: Dell Hikes Estimates for Next Four Years on Strong AI Demand
description: Dell Technologies Inc. roughly doubled its growth estimates for sales and profit for the next two years, and said demand for artificial intelligence products will extend those higher projections at least through the 2030 fiscal year. Shares rose.
content:

title: OpenAI wants to build the next era of the web, and it’s shelling out billions to do it
description: By Lisa Eadicicco, Clare Duffy, CNN New York (CNN) — OpenAI was an artificial intelligence research lab little known outside of Silicon Valley before ChatGPT debuted in November 2022. description: Skeptics of a recent investment spree involving OpenAI and others say deals raise questions about the robustness of the artificial intelligence boom.

title: Use of AI for holiday inspiration doubles in a year
description: Twice as many people are using artificial intelligence (AI) for holiday planning inspiration than a year ago, a new survey suggests.
content:
Travel trade organisation Abta, which commissioned the poll, described the technology as a “creative co-pilot” people can use to research, plan and book their trips.

title: IREN Stock Up Nearly 900% in Last 6 Months, Premarket Signals Another 5% Gain Today: What’s Driving The Explosive Surge?
description: Shares of IREN Ltd (NASDAQ: IREN) climbed 8% in pre-market trading on Tuesday, as the data center operator announced multi-year agreements with major artificial intelligence companies deploying NVIDIA Corp.'s (NASDAQ: NVDA) Blackwell GPUs.
